it.polimi.se2018.alternative_network.newserver.rmi

Class RMIPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.alternative_network.newserver.rmi.RMIPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RemotePlayer2

    public class RMIPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements RemotePlayer2
    Classe utilizzata per inviare messaggi al client NON RICEVE MESSAGGI DAL CLIENT (se non per il return)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameInterface getGameInterface()
      when the remote player is associated with a game return the reference to the interface that allows to send messages directly to the game room and to notify a disconnection.
      int getIdPlayerInGame()
      method for get the id of the remote player in the game room
      java.lang.String getNickname()
      method for get the name of the remote player
      boolean isPlayerRunning()
      method for get if the remote player is still reachable by the server or game room
      void kickPlayerOut()
      method that need to implement the remove from the client gatherer or any type of class that the player use to send the View.
      void sendEventToController(EventController eventController)
      method of the Rmi player for send the event directly to the game room without passing thought the main server that hold all the game room
      void sendEventToView(EventClient eventClient)
      this method is used when the game room needs to send some EventClient to the client related to this remote player
      void setGameInterface(GameInterface gameInterface)
      method to associate the remote player with the game room
      void setIdPlayerInGame(int idPlayerInGame)
      method for set the id of the remote player in the game room
      void setNickname(java.lang.String nickname)
      method for set the name of the player, typically is received when he ask to make the login
      void setPlayerRunning(boolean playerRunning)
      method for set if the remote player is still connected without trying to contact him

        Description copied from interface: RemotePlayer2
